We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private Momentum _mom;
// In Initialize()
_mom = MOM(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_mom.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOM Warm Up Period", _mom.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOM Period", _mom.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOM Is Ready", _mom.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOM Current", _mom.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOM Name", _mom.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MOM Samples", _mom.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.mom = self.MOM(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.mom.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOM Warm Up Period", self.mom.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOM Period", self.mom.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOM Is Ready", self.mom.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOM Current", self.mom.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOM Name", self.mom.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MOM Samples", self.mom.Samples);
